nodes.text: The Nineteenth Army, also known as Dark Saber Command, was a Republic and later Imperial Sector Army charged with the defense of the Javin Oversector. It was commanded by Moff Sulamar.

During the Clone Wars, the 19th Sector Army fought in a number of battles against the Separatists while the latter advanced from Kinyen to Bomis Koori. The Sector Army ultimately retained control of the Kriselist junction in a hard fought campaign.
